channel.title: Some BMS wallpaper by me =)
channel.description:
I made three versions of BMS 2 years ago, hope you like it =) they are all 1280x1024
[url=https://img188.imageshack.us/my.php?image=bmsss.jpg][img]https://img188.imageshack.us/img188/8529/bmsss.th.jpg[/img][/url] [url=https://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=bmssscopy.png][img]https://img504.imageshack.us/img504/4840/bmssscopy.th.png[/img][/url] [url=https://img504.imageshack.us/my.php?image=blackmesasourcewall1280.jpg][img]https://img504.imageshack.us/img504/7681/blackmesasourcewall1280.th.jpg[/img][/url]

item.title: Some BMS wallpaper by me =)
item.dc:creator: SergeyDruid
item.description:
Here is the new wallpaper as I promised. It’s kinda “creepy” and the Crowbar remember lambda logo. :freeman:
This preview is 1600x1200

I used all possible good resolution modes:

  • 1920x1200
  • 1920x1080
  • 1680x1050
  • 1440x900
  • 1280x1024
  • 1600x1200

Lower resolutions are easy scalable (OS) so i don’t think it’s a big problem…

So here the links to download this second pack:
https://www.filefront.com/14021421/Black_Mesa_Source_Wallpapers_creepy_by_SergeyDruid.zip

https://depositfiles.com/files/te8wogien

Also check it out on DeviantArt:
https://sergeydruid.deviantart.com/art/Black-Mesa-Source-Creepy-129160704

I’m going to create the final wallpaper, it will take a bit time

[COLOR=‘Silver’]Stay tuned =D

Read full topic

item.title: Some BMS wallpaper by me =)
item.dc:creator: SergeyDruid
item.description:
So I created a new Wallpaper for BMS, this time is more like a “glass” or a kind of “hologram”. :freeman:
This preview is 1600x1200

For this one I used all possible good resolution modes:

  • 1920x1200
  • 1920x1080
  • 1680x1050
  • 1440x900
  • 1280x1024
  • 1600x1200

Lower resolutions are easy scalable (OS) so i don’t think it’s a big problem…

So here the links to download this pack:
https://www.filefront.com/14002443/Black_Mesa_Source_Wallpapers_tech_by_SergeyDruid.zip

https://depositfiles.com/files/99krtxltz

Also check it out on DeviantArt:
https://sergeydruid.deviantart.com/art/Black-Mesa-Source-Tech-128859042

I’m working on another 2 wallpapers packs, the first one is more creepy, the second will be “old half life menu” style. :freeman:

[COLOR=‘Silver’]Stay tuned =D

Read full topic

item.title: Some BMS wallpaper by me =)
item.dc:creator: Sitten_duck
item.description:
SergeyDruid:

I made three versions of BMS 2 years ago, hope you like it =)
they are all 1280x1024

I like the first one the best. I don’t think the first one is too crowded. I think ithas an interesting framing effect witht the lens flare. There is probably a better way to frame it other than a lens flare, but it really doesn’t look that bad. You could try removing the left dark curved area and try adding an identical lens flare on that side so it is like ( ). It really is to bad that you don’t have a… oh, I don’t know… widescreen 16:10 1680x1050…

Read full topic

item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

Definitely not bad. Could use some more choices for size though…
Widescreen would be a plus cough

Thanks for the view; well I made them more then 2 years ago, and I was not so good with photoediting software. I’m planning to do better quality wallpapers for BMS with a larger possibilities of resolution
